text: I struggled paying attention to this film. It's not a bad movie and the cast is really good. The problem is, they should've gone with another director because this one totally bombed. This could've been a really good movie, the plot was there, the action was there, good actors, bit of comedy, tad bit of romance, but they should've gotten rid of the director.. What a shame :(

title: A New Franchise with Potential
text: When it comes to original content Disney either gets it really right (e.g. Pirates of the Caribbean) or really wrong.So you can imagine I was a bit on the fence before watching this.But the movie pleasantly surprised me! It has stunning sets, costumes, cinematography and production. The story is not bad either with some nice twists.The best thing about this movie is Emily Blunt and the Rock as they have fabulous chemistry and the spark of an amazing film duo!The movie has franchise potential not as much as Pirates of the Caribbean but certainly better than Alice in Wonderland or Maleficent!I think it's worth checking out for a fun time.

title: NEGATIVE REVIEWERS, get over yourselves!.
text: Is it silly? Sure. Is it funny, at times hysterically so? Absolutely. Is the cast brilliant? Yes, even when given less than brilliant dialogue. The ONLY problem is at the end, when the emergence of the undead and th supernatural gets out of hand. Should have heat it in the realm of joking reality, like when they are "captured" by the tribe of woman-led natives. But the first half and the end make up for the mistake, so stop taking it so seriously and enjoy the beautifully-shot ride!

title: Kinejin
text: Sad to say, this is a really bad film, despite the excellent casting of Dwayne Johnson and Emily Blunt in the leads, and the ever-reliable Jesse Plemons in an interesting turn as a proto-Nazi villain -- straight out of the "Raiders of the Lost Ark" playbook. I wasn't expecting much from this film, given the source material -- an amusement park ride! -- but thought the sturdy cast could help elevate the material. Even excellent actors such as are on hand here can't help lazy and derivative material. The numerous sexual innuendos are a bit puzzling, especially in a scene between Johnson and Blunt's characters early in the film, apparently to appeal to adults woefully assigned with accompanying their children, but are really out of place and inappropriate. The CGI was expected, and despite such excellent studios as WETA and ILM behind it, was lackluster and unconvincing. Not even worth a view on TV; use the time for anything else.

title: The nostalgia!!!
text: I loved it! I have been going to Disneyland since the 70's, and the jungle cruise was one of my favorite rides. They used all of the jokes from the ride and brought back years of memories. What could be better than flashbacks of happy moments in life?

title: It fun but predictable
text: It fun but predictable. Fell asleep half way for a few minutes!

title: Great escapism for the whole family!
text: I really enjoyed this movie. Very similar to The Mummy or Pirates of the Caribbean. The plot is predictable, but so fun to watch! I love Emily Blunt and she was just magical in this film.

title: A great movie ... If you're 9
text: Dwayne Johnson makes another sweaty appearance in a new safari movie. Expect lots of jumping around and protagonist-like charm that no lady - Emily Blunt in this case - could resist.Nothing but family friendly dialogues and 'intense' fight scenes under mundane orchestral pieces fit for 'exactly this kind of movie'. A must watch if you're babysitting, unless you've already watched Brendan Fraser's The Mummy then you can skip this one.

title: Disney Falls Again
text: The correct age rating for this movie is not PG-13, PG must be 9 months to 13 years old and not over 13 years old to watch, because it is the killer of the moments of their lives!

title: Summer Fun Flick
text: Fantastick Fun! Action packed. Dwayne Johnson is THE Action Hero of this millenia.

title: So wrong
text: What a mess of a movie. I think if I was 12 this would still be awful. They spent all the money and missed. If Disney would have been more historically accurate and not so cartoonish this would be better with this type of story.

title: Great film.
text: I really enjoyed this film, the action was very good, as was the acting.Dwayne Johnson is a really good action star, I really enjoy his films, Jack Whitehall was funny, and Emily Blunt was brilliant and looked so radiant.The best performance though was Jesse Plemons, he was awesome.It's a very enjoyable action adventure, well worth watching.

title: Okish.
text: It not awful basically a straight to dvd movie. The Dwane Johnson has had some decent performances though this is not one. The movie is just a mishmash of lots of other movies and nothing original.

title: Big laughs
text: I didn't expect to be so entertained by this movie. I must have had a big grin on my face for the first 40 minutes.The Rock and Emily Blount were both very funny and had enough chemistry to make their pairing believable. The CGI was impressive and wowed me visually.The story is typical Disney similar to Pirates of the Caribbean. The bad guys are scary but humorous at the same time. The first 2 thirds of the movie was fun but the ending was predictable and a bit tedious. Since I already knew what was going to happen I just wanted it to end. I enjoyed this movie and highly recommend.

title: Brazil?
text: Here in Brazil we speak Portuguese, not English or Spanish.I heard they speak more German in the movie than Portuguese.They really didn't have the researched what currency was in Brazil that time or how do you speak the plural of "real".Aqui no Brasil nós falamos português não inglês ou espanhol.Eu escutei eles falando mais alemão do que português no filme.Eles nem pesquisaram qual era o nome da moeda no Brasil naquela época ou como se fala o plural de "real"

title: Fun
text: Family fun. Exciting. Not perfect. But a great family film.

title: Blunt, DJ good -- writing not so much
text: This is probably one better tolerated by younger kids. We got so bored an hour in that the plot just didn't matter anymore.It's the same setup as THE MUMMY with a brother/sister duo off to find a fabled but possibly real site of a lost artifact of immense value, and they need the help of a scoundrel who can get them there. The acting is fine, but the script is horrid. It's info-dumps galore, clunky, and weighs in on the bloated side for run time.

title: Keep the good movie times rolling on the river
text: Pretty big fan of The Rock and his movies so despite the string of horrible Disney releases in the past couple of years, I decided to give it a shot. Got to say I was pretty impressed. Plenty of good action and, yes to other people's review points there is plenty of Disney wokeness baked in, but they at least found a way to tamp it down to make it tolerable. The banter between The Rock and Emily Blunt is fun to watch and the actors put on a good show. All in all, I would give this movie a high review, definitely worth seeing. We need more entertaining movies like this. People need to remember that Hollywood will always bake politics into movies but I like how they did this with it not being over the top. Bring in good writers and good actors like this and keep the good movie times rolling.

title: Shadow of the tomb raider with comedy
text:
Visuals are great. Casting could be better..
Too much unesessary comedy.. story is not convincing..

title: Better than expected
text: Went to the movie theatre to see this, and I picked this one, not sure if I was gonna like it or find it boring but I didn't really think twice and watched it anyways. The movie slowly started to become more entertaining, and there was also many funny moments I didn't expect, and it was also refreshing see jokes more savage related, that weren't dirty, or naughty due to it being a family movie, and they didn't seem forced.Another thing I was impressed with was all the sight seeing backgrounds, and some of the action... I kept questioning "How they did that?" The only thing I found off was all the violence the characters got in that got repetitive, and some scenes were too predictable but again I understand that's why it's called an action movie.Overall I'd recommend, this movie was also over 2 hours long and I didn't even bother checking the time until the credits.

title: Watch only if you love Love LOVE "Dad Jokes"
text: I really wanted to love this movie. Nope. The critter was great! But the literally never-ending dad jokes were too much and not nearly as funny as apparently everyone at Disney thinks they are. They dumbed down the movie significantly. I'm being generous at 5 stars because of the critter and some other interesting factors that sadly don't involve the two major start. Jack Whitehall is the human saving factor! (I mean, if you forget that Paul Giamatti was in it by the end, well ...........)

title: Simple but it works
text: Mix Pirates of the Caribbean, Indiana Jones, Allan Quatermain, throw the result into the jungle and you're done.This is the Jungle Cruise recipe.The movie is very generic, but that's not to say it's good... and this simple thing, but it works.The special effects could have been better. But nothing that causes too much damage.A good movie won't make you want your ticket back or feel like you wasted your time.

title: Average is best
text: Loved the first act. Great casting with the only decent would be the rock.Then the movie turned into a weird mix of pirates if the Caribbean and the lack of color grading didn't help with my visual experience.

title: Exciting movie
text: Pretty awesome movie . Storyline ,comedy ,british/french accent ,adventure all are awesome .You will not leave seat for a little while while watching .

title: Did not go to sleep (Pay the story writers)
text: I have watched Indiana Jones(all parts) a few times. I can still watch it.Not this movie. There was no chemistry between the actors. Boring boring .Dont know why i am giving it a 2. I can watch Pirates of the Caribean again and again.

title: A fun ride from A-Z
text: This movie was a whole lot of fun. It felt as if I had gone on an adventure myself. The special effects were outstanding, the actors did an amazing job and this movie kept my full attention throughout. I fully enjoyed every minute of this wonderful typically Disney tale. Sit back, relax and let them take you away into another world filled with fun and action.

title: A almost good matinee adventure from Disney !
text: Started off great then the CGI-madness began. Cast was nice with good chemistry. Story was sort of okay and the music was average at best. A almost good matinee adventure from Disney !

title: Loved it
text: I loved it! It was Pirates of the Caribbean good and exciting. It's like this generations Pirates of the Caribbean. I really enjoyed it. It was a great story. It was the perfect balance of comedy and drama and fantasy. It's a great movie for all ages.

title: only for the simple-minded
text: Disney's whole mode of operation now with film is to just throw a lot of money into the CGI dept and hope for the best. Sure, they spent some money on the latest "actor" to be en vogue, but -trust me- The Rock and Emily Blunt are 5 trillion miles from Bogart and Hepburn; they can barely keep this thing afloat.After having your eyes pummeled by "great" CGI (tell me how "great" it is in 5 years!), you get a rehashed "plot" leftover from Pirates of the Caribbean and that crappy Mummy remake in the 90s. Plus a lot of Indiana Jones tropes to really drive the point home.Sorry, but Disney is over. Yes, this will make its money back (mostly overseas), and maybe even warrant a sequel; but surely Walt is spinning in his grave!

title: Non Existent Story and Bad Jokes Aplenty
text: I can't help but think what kind of film this could have been when Walt was still alive because there were plenty of great Disney films based on very little long ago. This film is a collage of different films from Indy, Jumanji (the original), and many others yet it pales on every level. If the lack of interesting story isn't enough, the horrible jokes and over-the-top forced comedy will.

title: Perfect for Family
text: This was a great film to watch for my 2nd trip back to the theatre in a year. Superstar cast and amazing special effects make this movie what it is. Its packed with comedy, action and reveals you didn't see coming. It looks STUNNING, I watched in 3D and was not disappointed. This was a great film to see with the whole family, however there are some parts that could be scary for children 5 and under (Its based in a Jungle with creepy crawlies, paired with the occasional jump scare and slight murder) The plot, if broken down, could be seen as cliche at times but instead of tearing this movie apart, I simply enjoyed it. All around, if you are looking for a movie to see in theaters with a diverse group, this is the one!

title: Just because
text: I love this movie just because it shows a man and woman loving each other. At this time and age, kind of revolutionary.

title: Perfect disney
text: Wow I love it one of my best movie in this year! Cruella and jungle cross one of my best movie in this year thank you disney for making a macterpacie.

title: Another great flick!!
text: Disney has outdone itself again. Great main actors. Along with great directing and just quite simply put amazing graphics!! A fun movie all the way Thur. Emily blunt is just amazing, she can play any type of character in any movie and increase its quality great job Disney thanks!!

title: A little boring
text: I find this movie a bit boring, just at the end it catches you a bit.

title: Fun and entertaining
text: This is a great fun and entertaining movie. They even add in the cheesy lines from the Jungle Cruise in Disneyland. If your looking for some fun, this is a great one to see.

title: It's R Rated
text:
The look of villain is very horror it should be r Rated
And action is good
Cast and acting is also good
Story was not good.

title: Based on a Theme Park Ride!
text: Of all the wonderfully unique things to base a film on, a theme park ride would have to be near the top!But with Disney's typical touch of magic, "Jungle Cruise" explodes with sheer beauty and brilliance; it feels very much like classic Disney, like this film could have been released during the 60's, only with more up to date special effects.The Rock goes from strength to strength, he is becoming more and more comfortable in his film roles now, to the extent that I can honestly say that he's having a wail of a time here with Emily Blunt, whom he shares amazing chemistry with.From a story standpoint, the plot is wafer thin and somewhat lacking, but that's not the point with this film; it is the overall feel of it that counts, and everything other than the plot is truly majestic.As much as I dislike needless sequels, I do hope we get a sequel to "Jungle Cruise", if only to see The Rock and Emily Blunt together again.

title: Jungle Cruise
text: Emily Blunt is in search of the petals of an ancient tree that can cure all disease and is hidden, according to legend, somewhere in the Amazon. Along with her wimpy brother Jack Whitehall, she hires riverboat captain Dwayne Johnson to help her find the treasure.Whilst the story offers little in the way of novelty, the action set pieces are fun enough and the chemistry and interplay between the leads strong. Overall, a pleasant couple of enjoyable, unremarkable hours.

title: A fun adventure/comedy worthy of the likes of Indiana Jones
text: If you took The Mummy, Indiana Jones, and Pirates of the Caribbean, this movie would be the result of it. It has the action and the adventure to keep a good pace throughout the movie with jokes and puns spaced in between to keep it lighthearted enough for kids and adults. While Disney has been hit and miss with movies based off of their attractions and rides (Pirates = Good, Haunted Mansion = Bad), Jungle Cruise delivers.Would definitely recommend as this movie is going into my family's normal rotation of movies to watch.

title: Its an acting race
text: A fantastic movie to watch after a long time especially during the pandemic. The amazing part is that it was like a race for acting by everyone and especially I love the part played by Jesse Plemons who did it amazing to watch. Definitely a must watch movie.

title: An okay remake of many other adventure films
text: This felt like a shot-for-shot remake of every other adventure movie, all stemming from the comedic and storytelling aspects of the Indiana Jones franchise.The film was certainly very enjoyable, but it felt so long and overdone. Jungle Cruise kept capitalizing on the jokes and silliness of many of the adventure films that preceded it, and it slowly became goofy and somewhat irritating. While it did have a nice style that followed themes that we've seen, it became a bore fest with cgi and lighting that really started to hurt my eyes.I watched it on Disney Plus, so it might have been different for those who saw it in theaters.Emily Blunt and Dwayne Johnson are great actors in this film, and they had great chemistry. But they overshadowed many of the other characters, including the villains, who also felt silly and didn't provide any sort of intimidation that you'd like from a film like this one.All in all, a nice comedic watch that slowly becomes more tiring due to the material it keeps exaggerating and implementing, and feels more like a copy+paste of something you've already seen, rather than a homage with a creative spin.

title: Rock and Blunt in the house !
text: Fun-filled, entertaining action adventure to retrieve a flower petal which will cure all possible diseases.You can see shades of Indiana Jones and Pirates of Carribbean with the overkilled story of saving the world but with solid casting, tons of fun, great action and comedy episodes this is a charming super good watch with your family on a weekend.I thoroughly loved Rock and Emily blunt combination and I hope they turn this into a franchise !

title: What a Summer blockbuster should be!
text: I purchased this movie to watch from home and will watch it multiple times. I've liked Dwayne Johnson and Emily Blunt in previous movies and from reading the other reviews decided I would probably like this one. I was not disappointed. This movie is filled with action from beginning to end, lots of jokes from Johnson that are so bad they're funny and the chemistry between Johnson & Blunt is really what makes this a delight to watch! Special effects are everything you would expect for a big budget film, plus the soundtrack by James Newton Howard is top notch! So if you loved the Indiana Jones movies you should love this one as well.

title: Best Movie
text: Has a lot of action with a little bit of unsuspecting romance.

title: It's fun, but The Rock is no romantic lead.
text: U know what it was cute and fun but there were def a lot of issues. Definitely not the pirates of the Caribbean spiritual successor it wanted to be but like prob not the worst of Disney's random live action movies.

text: Let's just say I'm almost glad for the Pandemic Paranoia that induced me not to go to a theater and pay to see this overblown turkey. Too bad I can't get a refund from Disney+.😁

title: The Mummy meets Pirates of the Caribbean meets lots and lots and lots of CGI
text: Dwayne Johnson once again stars in a jungle movie and ends up being turned into a rock. That's the summary of this movie.In other words, you could say that this movie is just like The Mummy: A female English explorer with a fearful brother sets off to a distant land during the First World War to find a legendary, mystical place, guided by a rascal, who initially seems harsh, but in the end the two develop an affection for each other. But you could also describe the movie as a soulless CGI orgy where everything is fake and you feel like you're in an amusement park or in a video game. Basically, a movie like this could now pass as an animated movie. Only the actors are real - but not in all scenes either.Not even the simplest landscape shots in this movie are real. Everything is just green screen: from the tranquil village on the Amazon river, to the dolphins in the water or the pet jaguar. Not to mention the breakneck steamboat ride across the Amazon river that defies all laws of physics. Every Looney Tunes comic is more realistic than what Disney and Co. Present us in feature movies these days. I always ask myself: If kids grow up today and only know movies like these - how disappointed will they have to be when they visit such countries one day and then don't see any jaguars as nice pets, no indigenous people standing around on every corner in colorful feather costumes, who live in fancy tree houses in the jungle, and the boat trips are not like wild rollercoaster rides.How did our Spanish conquistador manage to develop a flawless American accent when he was surrounded by Spanish-speaking people along the Amazon river for 400 years? And why hasn't anyone noticed that he doesn't grow older and never dies? And who would take a submarine into the shallow reaches of the Amazon river? Speaking of river: The Amazon river is constantly changing its riverbed. A 400-year-old map would be completely useless today, because the river branches shown there would either no longer exist today or they would look completely different than they used to.By the way: Didn't Emily Blunt want to free all of humanity from illness and physical suffering by finding the flowers of this tree? Then in the end she gets her hands on one of them and uses it to bring Dwayne Johnson back to mortal life - without knowing at the time that another flower has bloomed. So she would have sacrificed the well-being of humanity for one person who was actually planning on finally dying anyway. Very clever Emily!And Dwayne Johnson looks ridiculous in a purple suit and top hat. However, he doesn't look any better with that ridiculous cap on.

title: Nice and watchable adventure movie!
text: The movie seemed to be exactly how I expected it to be. A good and funny adventure movie. Kind of like Pirates of the Carribean/the Mummy (1999) vibe.Dwayne Johnson has a nice roll with a dry sense of humour that kind of cracked me up some of the time. It has some good special effects and some twists that made the whole experience entertaining.

title: New Disney Adventure for kiddies
text: Found myself liking this movie. This is odd, usually i do not, but this time, i did.The movie is not boring, they kept it concise, didnt waste time with anything, everything is there because it had to be there.I wont spoil too much. 5/10 watch it.

title: Adventure
text: Movie is fun, thrilling and adventurous. Reminds me a lot of Indiana Jones. The Rock and Emily are so great together.

title: The poor man's Mummy
text: A woman with an interest in science and her brother find a map to an ancient treasure and enlist a somewhat shady adventurer who just happens to be in a desperate situation to get them there. Sounds familiar? You're not wrong. But while the Mummy could leverage this setup with good character development a strong antagonist with a believable motivation and just the right blend of suspense, action and humor, jungle cruse suffers from lazy writing, questionable casting decisions and barely concealed identity politics.First, you can clearly tell who is good and bad in this movie by their diversity score, which ruins at least one major twist as you see it coming from a mile away. And while Emily Blunts character isn't a full blown girlboss (she is allowed to make the occasional mistake) her smugness is hard to stomach at times. Dwayne Johnsons character is probably the most interesting here but is very much held back by The Rock's limited acting range. At least the action scenes do work mostly work and save Jungle Cruise from running aground completely but the whole movie feels very passionless and derivative.

title: I couldn't get past Benny Hill
text: The "German" baddie appears to be a reincarnation of benny hill and totally ruins the film. Otherwise good mindless hokum. Excellently special effects as usual.

title: Fun adventure film
text: You get everything you expect from Disney's The Jungle Cruise, adventure, humor, mystery and great special effects.In addition Emily Blunt and Dwayne Johnson have great chemistry together.It's a fun adventure film everyone should enjoy.

title: Best movie of all time
text: Best jokes of all times, Worth spending 2 hours to watch it.Thank you and I hope you enjoy the movie.

title: C (flat 5). August 21' @Regal
text: Does a little bit of everything. Feels very by the numbers... a checklist type of film. Very watchable but needs a shorter runtime. Decent CGI backdrops and animals but questionable CGI towards the end.

title: Best movie of the year so far!
text: It's on par with the Pirates of the Caribbean movies. It didn't appear to have as big of budget but the story and acting were better than the Johnny Dope franchise.

title: Worse than I expected
text: How do you put Emily Blunt and Dwayne "the Rock" Johnson together and get something so boring and lifeless? Don't waste your time with this. Just watch The African Queen.

title: Unexpectedly very cool.
text: Uncharted from Disney. Very good duet of Dwayne Johnson and Emily Blunt.

title: Boring but nice visual
text: I am very disappointed by this movie. It had so much potential and I was so excited for it. The movie started off very well. Very much like The Mummy. The opening movie of 20 mins is really very good but after that it gets boring. Nothing special, the dialogues are not funny at all. The ending is also not that great. Not interested to watch a sequel.

title: One of the best Disney movies !
text: Everything was good : a perfect scenario with a lot of surprises, excellent acting and amazing direction. Truly hope this movie gets an Oscar or two.

title: Classic all age adventure movie, good acting but still classic nothing strong
text:
Great acting
Love the decor have done
Like how they have done the story telling
The small details are nicely added
Pity they have used so much special effect that are ok but could see the different and some painful especially the digital colors. I really do not understand when they combine it so much, why that much effort when everything is done 50/50
Like the innovative elements, but it is pity that the execution is not that well thought
Love the actions
Like the small humor they make
They do struggle what age they want to focus on, Children (4-10) or young adults (20-40)
The ending is just a classic adventure Hollywood ending, boring.

title: What an amazing ride.
text: Wow! I have been missing something for so long,not knowing what. Well, this is it.I have been missing these feel good,happy adventure type movies, we rarely get to see such movies being made now.This movie took me on a really amazing, Fun and adventurous journey ,just what I wanted.

title: Amazon forest
text:
It's in amazon forest
Good n adventure story based
In hall with brother enjoy this.

title: Great fun movie
text: I really enjoyed this movie. It was a classic feel good fun Disney movie.The characters were all great (Loved Jack Whitehall character) and the action scenes and effects were all spot on.A proper family film to enjoy with everyone.

title: Unremarkabke
text: This movie definitely had a Disney feel to it, and I felt myself remembering all of the pre CGI Disney classics from when I was younger.Sadly, that's about all it had going for it.An unremarkable and forgettable film that cost more than it was worth.

title: Very funny
text: Jack Whitehall was excellent really fun film. Kids loved it.

title: Mini Indiana Jones
text:
My Kind of movie....(2 extra points for that)
Adventure, Ancient mysteries, Jungle, Animals, silly villain, reasonable story and humor.A family movie to enjoy with kids...It's worth a ride in this Cruise....!

title: Mass entertainer
text: All Dwayne Johnson stuff, like slight action, comedy, adventure, plus a beautiful story based from Disney...Emily blunt was spectacular...overall a terrific package..

title: Talk about cruising
text: I really feel that when they finished the filming for this movie they had a fairly decent family film. It had some funny moments, big name actors, heck even a sufficient cliche plot that could have cut it. However, who ever put it all together must have been on acid or something! I really don't ever feel dizzy during movies, but man this one almost made me sick. Not only was the plot so incredibly quick that I didn't have time to think, the editing was so bouncy. It felt like the directs didn't want me to look at the cgi sets for longer than a few seconds because they thought I might find them fake. In the very last fight scene there was so much going on with the plot and the screen was jerking between shots so quickly I really couldn't follow along or, by any means, take it seriously. To some it all up, really a wasted movie that I didn't need to see. I'm just gonna stick to pirates of the Caribbean.

title: Liked this movie, except a few minus points
text: Having watched Dwayne Johnson in Jumanji, expected a similar kind of roller coaster ride and this movie matched it almost. When they make this kind of movies, they should also take children under 10 into account and avoid kissing and other similar scenes to the max, because that's the drawback of this movie. Acting, emotions and dialogue delivery wise Dwayne, Emily, Edgar & Jack have scored equally well, but highlight of the movie is its cinematography and visual effects, beautifully pictured. Dwayne should start focusing on other genres of the movies too, as it will add variety to his kitty.

title: So many resources, such a waste of time
text: Disney is starting a new marketable franchise, think the "Pirates of the Caribbean" with an inidiana-jonesy aftertaste.Do you remember how the "Pirates" started well, but quickly went downhill in the sequels? "Jungle Cruise" feels like it's already several sequels down that road. Script writers scrambling for any original ideas, actors tired of playing the same old characters. I feel for them.Music is good, though. The Rock and dad jokes are a hit. And thank you Metallica for being awesome, back in the day!

title: One of the best Disney movies I've seen in awhile
text: I really enjoyed this movie and I think it's already one of my favorites, probably one of the best Disney movies I've watched in awhile! This movie was full of fun, laughs, and adventure and I enjoyed about every minute of it. I got major Indiana Jones and Pirates of the Caribbean vibes from the type of adventure and characters and even some of the music reminded me of Pirates of the Caribbean and Toy Story. It was also a nice touch that they included the song Nothing Else Matters that Metallica themselves re-recorded for the film!

title: Awesome movie
text: Exciting, cool scenes, fun and good acting. Looking forward to the sequel. Perfect adventure movie. Reminds me of pirates of the caribbean.Have a nice Day!

title: Stupid and devoid of charm
text: Emily Blunt was the endearing thing in the film that made me want to finish it. The Rock seems to have used up most of his charm in such movies by now. Sometimes it felt like Anaconda, sometimes Pirated of the Caribbean but there's also Aguirre. Rock and Blunt had not much chemistry. I was ready to enjoy it for what it was in the beginning but it didn't have good enough pacing or anything substantial in the film to keep me engaged. And yet I can't really hate it because it's been a long time since I have seen such an adventure film for which I was really waiting for.

title: Impressed
text: Must watch. I loved this movie. Disney out Disneyed themselves with this one.This flick had it all. It was pure fun. Reminded me of early 90s films I saw growing up.The chemistry between Rock and Emily, was intense. You could really feel the shift from total strangers in the beginning, to being in love by the end of film. (It's easy to see, so this isn't a spoiler.)

title: GARBAGE!!
text: This movie is terrible, Emily blunt is probably the worst character in the movie, really really bad and annoying, she was trying a bit too hard to be cute, but it was a train wreck. Dwyane Johnson looked not interested in the movie. I turned off after an hour, couldn't get past that. Poor CGI too. I felt like this movie is copied from some other old movies. Story and screenplay was pathetic.The attempts at humor in "Jungle Cruise" fell flat, relying heavily on outdated jokes and awkward banter that failed to land with the audience. It seemed as if the filmmakers were trying too hard to recreate the charm of classic adventure films but ended up with a forced and cringe-worthy script.

title: Family entertainment at it's best
text: Really good pace from the very beginning the movie pulls you in quickly and makes you laugh. Maybe could have had a better cut in the last 25 minutes special effects without any storyline loses me when it goes on to long. Great casting the three leads were really enjoyable in there roles. Watching with the whole family felt more like an older family movie with a joke for everyone. Enjoyable for all.

title: Disappointing, but not surprising
text: I don't even think this would make for a solid kids movie with how washed and shallow it is: there's no depth, not even to the Era they're set in. The characters have little development and are pretty stereotypical. The romance is forced. The plot twist comes out of nowhere, in a bad way that's not well exectuted. It goes on way too long as well. The humor fell flat for us. It's sort of entertaining if you're scrapping the bottom of barrel for something to executed. Whoever made this movie didnt seem to put much into it and to expect the fact that they got Dwayne Johnson to star in it to make it sell. We couldn't even finish it it felt like such a waste of time. If you want to watch a movie like this, go watch the original Jumaji, Indiana Jones (there's tons of those), National Treasure, The Goonies, Zathura: A Space Adventure (if you're felling space-y). They'll give you a proper adventure/treasure-hunting fix.

title: A delightful & eccentric watch
text: Intelligent, belligerent, radical... Works às a revival to the original mummy series with sufficient twists and turns those make it more enjoyable.

title: The best DRJ movie! Ever!
text: I must say I didn't like the new adventure /fantasy idea of Dwayne appearing in movie like this again, after Jumanji was a real disaster in my opinion.But I watched it and enjoyed every second of it. Story was great, acting was spot on. This is one of those movies that keeps you watching and not paying attention to anything around you.Story was great from start to the finish.Give it a try, you'll enjoy it. This is easily best Dwayne Rock Johnson movie.

title: I've been to Disney!
text: Wow! Great Effects, photography, and Story-line!But, right off the bat you can tell it's just another movie designed by Disney to be lucrative and to promote Disney World.I've come to realize its harder and harder to watch a lot of movies these days because of the actors begin so political, it takes away from enjoying the characters they are playing. Too, with Disney's socio-political approach being so contradicting with what Walt Disney had envisioned for his "family" theme parks, this will probably be our last Disney movie.You will like this movie. To a some degree, it is wholesome, family rated, and the kids will enjoy it too.For us, we thought we were in Disney on the Jungle ride.... just a new take on it.

title: It's funny and enjoyable and action packed
text: This movie is thoroughly enjoyable, honestly, don't think too much, D rock is really charismatic, the movie is 👍👍

title: Historical Error en scénario !
text: The moment Frank tells his past to Lily, he made a gigantic mistake during his speech on the boat, he spoke of a country called "Algeria", when this word was only discovered during the years 1900 during the colonization of France in the North Africa region, and knowing that Frank is 400 years old so his father and he lived there during a time when there was not a country of that name.I do not understand how to pay a large sum for this film with such faults without revision of the historical event?I think the filmmaker has no idea what he wrote! Or he was forced to introduce the name of a country that did not exist at the time.Historical Error!

title: Jungle Cruise
text: Dwayne Johnson was amazing in this film. To be honest all the characters in this film was great buy he really steals the show. He is the main character in this film. He is the captain of a cruise ship that takes passengers up and down a river boarding the jungle. And this is not a nice boat! The captain is also very mysterious. After agreeing to go on a voyage and paying the captain a lot of money, two adventures and the crew sat sail in what turns out to be a bug adventure and finding out that the captain has so many secrets and cannot be trusted at all to be who he says he is. This is such a fun and enjoyable film to watch with family!

title: Jungle Cruise
text: Let's start off by saying, yes the jokes are really bad. Well, hard to say anything is really exceptional in Jungle Cruise as it tried to fit a typical Disney story, mixed in with some forced "wokeness" into a 2 hours long motion picture. Everything is predictable with a cast of even more predictable supporting cast, especially the so called German heiress villain is exceptionally boring. Perhaps the only reason for this movie is to add a little back story to the already storied ride, but by the standard of this film, I'm not sure if that's a job well done, perhaps more harm than good have been done.

title: Family Entertainer
text: Good chemistry between the actors, some nice comedy but obvious plot. Good for family and kids. Will recommend watching on the big screen.

title: Fantastic Family Movie
text: The rock is a fantastic actor loved it. I think everybody should see it. The CGI was off the hook.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean
text: Good family film nothing more , Emily blunt great , not one for johnson , especially the ending the suit looked ridiculous on him , a johnny depp movie for sure ,Disney wake up and smell the coffee.

title: LOVE IT!
text: It's a wonderful blend of The Mummy, Jumanji and Indiana Jones. If you have children they will LOVE IT!

title: I thought cruises were supposed to be fun
text: This isn't Disney's first go-round with ride-inspired films. While some have been more successful than others (talk to Jack Sparrow), the Mouse House should get credit for trying new things in the wake of so many tired sequels that continue to be churned out like they're on a factory conveyor belt. That said, 'Jungle Cruise' feels more like a pool float in a swampy bayou.Yes, Emily Blunt and Dwayne Johnson are typically bankable leading actors. Yes, the plot is full of adventure, the dialogue is full of standard one-liners and the cinematography is full of beautiful (mostly CGI) rainforest scenery. Still, the final product comes off as inauthentic, contrived and dull. It's too long, too boring and resembles so many far superior films. It's more of a paper tiger than it is Captain Frank's pet jaguar.We all know that cruises have had a bad stretch recently. Unfortunately, 'Jungle Cruise' doesn't fare much better.

title: Great fun
text: This is what Disney does at its best. Pure escapism in the form of action, adventure and happy endings. I loved this from start to finish just for what it is, fun.

title: good adventure
text: This movie is actually very funny, good casting and very good visuals.One of the best parts is The Rock did not sing.Like all Disney movies and because menials cannot deal with reality, the heroes survive to live for that all important sequel .Great one for the kids, i can see those Disney dollars flying already on Merch.

title: Jungle cruise film review
text: Jungle cruise, well where do I start, this movie is action packed, funny, with lots of twists and turns and all around it's a great movie that shows the true potentials of what present day Disney is capable of making, it stars top billed actors including Dwayne Johnson, Jack Whitehall and Emily blunt, although at the same time it really lacks what the community wants and feels similar to a lot of other jungle movies starring Dwayne Johnson, nobody in particular wanted this movie to happen but everyone was somewhat excited to see what Disney could do, and it was exactly what we expected, don't get me wrong it's a great movie from start to finish, it's just that the movie didn't stand out and won't be well remembered by many. Other than the points I've stated the whole plot was a good idea the visual effects were great and I would recommend the movie to anyone interested in the adventure/action genre. Overall I'd rate the movie 5.5/10.

title: Fun, lighthearted movie for the family
text: I had no expectations going into this movie, and I ended up being pleasantly surprised. Perfect pacing that kept both my 6-year-old and myself engaged. The storytelling and lore appealed to our love of fantasy and adventure. Dad jokes galore (who doesn't love that?) and the conquistadors had a Pirates of the Caribbean aesthetic that brought back memories. Definitely would recommend.

title: Suprisingly good!
text: Not predictable, superb CGI, great acting, beautiful locations and stunning soundtrack! Didn't expect that tbh!

title: Jungle Cruise of the Caribbean
text: Take three parts Pirates of the Caribbean, one part The Mummy (1999) and add a sprinkling of The African Queen and you have this movie. Honestly, I was shocked by how much this felt like it should've been Pirates 8: Jungle Fever. I don't think the director had anything to with that franchise which leads me to think that the House of Mouse was really sticking their noses into this one and the director is just the one who got the credit.There's really not a ton to say about this one because it feels so much like going back over ground we've already tread pretty extensively. Yes, Johnson and Blunt are great and add their own charisma and talents to the screen, which is something, but that's not enough to make this feel like anything but a spin-off. It's funny at points, but each of those comes with this reminder that we're just splashing a new coat of paint on something we've seen before. If you're looking for a mindless romp that's fun but hollow, this will work. It's bright and colorful and you wont get bogged down with an overabundance of thought.

title: Why are there no kids
text: Solid film, but I felt it would have been so much better with a couple of kids in it.

title: The Rock says
text: Basically Pirates of the Caribbean but in the jungle. The problem is, it is a sleeper. They are coming out with a sequel, which I predict will flop because most people who watched this will be smart enough to watch something else.

title: Solid 8, maybe 8 1/2, very enjoyable
text: This movie left me smiling throughout. From the moment the movie opens, I'm smiling, because they used "Nothing Else Matters" as the opening music - one of my all-time favorite songs. The Rock's first scene had me cracking up. From his sass, to his Dad Jokes and seriously lame puns, Mr. Johnson definitely delivers. Definitely a wild, funny, enjoyable ride that is worth watching.

title: Funny; chemistry not much.
text: Action is great.Both of them have done a fine job.Could have kept it simple though. Didn't need extra complications. Because once you have them, movie refuses to end. I mean you still enjoy. Take a break. Come back. But then you are just waiting for it to end.

title: Great family movie
text: I thoroughly enjoyed this movie. I bought the premiere on Disney plus as I was hoping to go to the movies but we were in lockdown. Grabbed myself a coke & popcorn and it was spectacular.

title: Ignorance and cancel culture
text: The conquistadors were never in Brazil.....they also were not murderers. Read history. Conquistadors helped indigenous tribes against the real savage indigenous murderers.

title: Excellent Family Entertainment
text: We watched this movie together, and everyone in the family loved it. They laughed out loud, and they loved the action scenes in full swing. And when it ends, the kids were applauding - what a fantastic movie!The trailer did some injustice because we were not expecting the movie would be so fun when we watched the trailer.Emily Blunt was spectacular, and "The Rock" once again proved what a brilliant actor he is.Time very well spent :)

title: Ugh...
text: All the actors I enjoy.....but ..wow..a stupid movie. I turned it off...just bad...tries to be a African Queen and The Mummy at the same time.Please do not waste your life watching this tripe.

title: The most magical
text: The most magical blend of National Treasure and Pirates of the Caribbean.

title: Disappointing
text: Stop it guys I don't know why they are not coming out the typical boring style especially when you have the latest graphic technology now and when there already have been far better movies produced even years ago like Indiana John's and King Kong I just don't expect it!

title: Pleasantly surprised
text: Put this movie on, just curious and was really surprised at how fun and entertaining it is. Enjoyed the story but most of all, the witty banter and chemistry between Dwayne and Emily is so fun (and also her brother) Laughed a lot and found to be very humorous and kept me in the story from beginning to end. Beautifully shot, with classic Disney vibes and music, and will probably watch it again. Highly recommend!

title: We need more movies like this!
text: I honestly thoroughly enjoyed this movie from start to finish. Dwayne Johnson is perfectly cast here as is Emily Blunt two of my favorite actors. Without giving anything away this is one of those movies that never lets up from the get go. This is a feel good movie through and through and is a welcome relief from the struggles of daily life. Highly recommended.

title: Glorifies colonialism
text: It's a movie that has a very strong undertone that colonialism was a good thing. Acting of The Rock and Emily blunt is good and the graphics are of disney quality.

title: Family movie night
text: The movie was fun and adventurous. Full of beautiful scenery, exotic animals, and great acting. Keeps you guessing the entire time. The comedy and dad jokes were endless.

title: It's not great
text: Was expecting more laughs from this film especially with Jack Whitehall in it, however I found the cast interviews in the lead up to the release, way more entertaining.I know it's a fantasy kind of film and you expect madness, but this was too stupid along with some terrible acting.The film runs far too long and should've ended after 90 minutes, I found myself bored and falling asleep.

title: DIsney's back on form!
text: I'm writing this review as a guy who just enjoys movies for what they're intended, and this movie was intended to be FUN.It was FUN. Take a dose of early Pirates of the Caribbean, a spoonful of the Jumanji remakes, and a sprinkling of Indiana Jones. That's what this movie was.The casting was on point. I had no idea Paul Giamatti was in this and he was perfect for the role. Emily Blunt was outstanding, and Dwayne Johnson fit his role like a tight fitting glove.Cliches and tropes? Check. Do I care? No.The comedic elements were varied, with some very subtle ones. It was all well timed, with nothing overdone.Highly, highly recommended.

title: unoriginal, hollow entertainment of a Disneyland attraction
text: Disney produces another movie based on a Disneyland attraction (e.p. Pirates of the Carribean).This movie is a hybrid of "Indiana Jones" meets "Quatermain"/"Romancing the Stone" meets "Pirates of the Carribean", where the amount of references to "Pirates of the Carribean" is very high.The movie has a well-known cast, big budget, high production values, a lot of CGI and (it's Disney) some humor, but despite of the crafting, it's a very formulaic effort of a movie, the fun parts feel forced, the background story is rather a dark one resembling to "The Pirates of the Carribean" and does not really fit to the lighthearted story about the fake Rock skipper and the Indiana Blunt charakters.The movie tries to be entertaining and in some parts it delivers, but at the end it's an all-too-well-known, hollow hybrid of a movie, that is as fastly forgotten and out of mind as it started.

title: Just 30 minutes into movie
text: And gave it 10 stars. Since Mummy returns nobody made such nice adventure movie.

title: Razzies invented 7 new categories.
text: Someone told The Rock his acting got better and now he's never going to stop. Mercifully fell asleep 45 minutes in. Also, can jaguars be trained to tell time? Guess so. This is just awful.

title: Comedy and Action
text: This was a great adventure film for the whole family! Excellent jokes throughout and plenty of action to keep you interested. The special effects were fantastic and remind me a lot of Pirates of the Caribbean films. While I thoroughly enjoyed both of the characters, the topic of conversation between MacGregor and Frank as they chopped tree limbs was a detour from the plot and had no real place in the story. It was completely unnecessary to include and didn't add anything to the film. Emily Blunt was wonderful as always! I was glad to see Veronica Falcon in the film. She was a favorite actress of mine from Queen of the South (tv show.)

title: So bad it is hard to finish
text: The special effects are sketchy, the comedy is an modern day Laurel & Hardy and the story is not engaging enough for afternoon watching with the kids. This is actually one of the worst films I have seen in a long time.

title: Ha ha ha, What a fun adventure: Indiana Jones meets Pirates of the Caribbean
text: The only question is which Indiana Jones and Which Pirates of the Caribbean?A for sure solid ten for this specific genre. The bad guys are will also seem familiar.I would also say that a dash Around the World in 80 days was added to the mix.Thank you Disney for the Dad Jokes, Glad to see they still live on.

title: Fair Movie
text: Jungle Cruise is a fair movie. There is a really excellent performance by Emily Blunt.( Dr. Lily Houghton), that is straight out of Indiana Jones, and every scene she is in is worthwhile. The problems are her brother. MacGregor ( Jack White.hall). He is one pathetic character, and every scene he is in without Lily is aggravating ( especially his speech at the beginning). The other problem is the villains. Neither. Prince Joachim (Jesse Plemons.) nor the Spanish conquistadors bring one iota of menace to the movie. They are so cartoon like they make Cruella De Vil look like Lady MacBeth. As for. Dwayne Johnson ( Frank Wolff), I have seen him much better then this film. Basically he is meh and outacted by the leopard. Basically 10 for Blunt, 10 for the leopard, zero for her brother and villains and 5 for Johnson. That adds up to an average of five which is why I give it 5/10 stars. Again a fair movie.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean but with The Rock
text: Pirates of the Caribbean but with The Rock. My 8 year old son and I both really enjoyed the movie. Great acting, story and probably the best movie I've seen in 3D effects wise. I normally choose not to see films in 3D but I highly recommend seeing this movie in 3D.

title: Not Memorible
text: Disappointed. Was hoping to see something new and exciting, but instead found a female remake of Indiana Jones with a mix of Jumanji. The CGI was terrible and there was a lot of it! Jungle Cruise is predictable, but not terrible. The actors made it worth the watch as Dwayne Johnson delivers his usual performance along side the wonderful Emily Blunt. The jokes were fun but the love story was misplaced as it completely lacked chemistry.

title: Wow just like old times.
text: This movie reminds me the old good time of amazing movies. Just like old time, flawless amazing film. Just beautiful.

title: Jungle Gym
text: During WW1 (although that doesn't matter) a woman travels to the Amazon to find the tree of life. In a combination of knock off Indiana Jones and Pirates of the Caribbean, Disney owns both franchises why would you knock off your own product? Nevertheless it starts off well with good comedic side kicks. But once you hit the 2nd act it fails on multiple layers like an onion, like how the movie describes it. The mystic reveal was terrible, you can tell it was messed with in editing, you lose complete track of characters. It just misses crucial steps in the character arcs. A->?->C. What is in the middle is anyones guess. So when it reaches the finale you then have no connection to any of the heroes.

title: Wonderful adventure thriller
text:
A very good and clean old timer story line, which makes it more exciting an interesting.Glad it was filmed as old timer concept.Absolutely loved it, amazing story line, wonderful effects, outstanding entertainment, a perfect movie.Worth watching it on big screen again and again..
The best so far in the list of adventure thriller movies.And Rock as usual he just Rocks.Deserves 10 stars.

title: Once again, Scots are the punchline
text: Why does Disney see fit to make quite offensive jokes about the Scots in their films? Apparently we're good enough to make a successful film about (Brave), but then we're "backwater and incomprehensible" in other films (this, and Ralph Breaks the Internet).If any other nation or culture was subjected to the overtly offensive jokes about them, there would be outcry. But it's seemingly acceptable for the Scots to be the perpetual punchbag in Hollywood. Perhaps Americans should look into their own borders before insulting others.This movie was mediocre. A mindless fun romp through the Amazon that was a rehash of Raiders of the Lost Ark and Crystal Skull.I'd have had more patience for it if it didn't irritate the hell out of me in the first 10 mins with this joke.

title: Ok For Children
text: I liked this movie until the CGI took over. Maybe kids won't mind that aspect, but for me, it became a far-fetched cartoon with no bearing on reality whatsoever, which left me unable to empathize or relate to the characters.

title: Awesome
text: This is a really good movie. Good story, not boring. I love it!

title: Disappointed
text: I don't like to write negative reviews so I don't want to go on about how bad it was. It wasn't particularly bad, but with that cast, I hoped it would be ... better. A lot of the jokes felt forced or that we've heard them before. Go and watch another Dwayne Johnson movie.

title: Great fun movie
text: Watched it with my family and we loved it. Good characters and a fun story. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a good time.

title: Is it hot in here?
text: The second movie out of all the others I have seen were the film is better than the trailer. If you don't like it, get over yourself.

title: Just as Expected
text: If you love a classic "Rock" movie then you will love this one. It has the action, comedy, and is fun for the family. However, this is a two hour movie that definitely feels like it is on the longer side, especially for restless kids. For young kids, it can also be a little confusing, especially if you don't keep your eyes on the screen at all times. Overall, it is pretty true to the Disneyworld ride, but strays greatly from this idea more towards the end.

title: Really enjoyed the film thought that it was very good
text: I really enjoyed this movie I thought that it would be a bit boring but it was great Really enjoyed it got into it from start to finish love the actors in the film great trailer looked very good and I wasn't disappointed with the outcome of the film I thought that the film was very good and I really enjoyed it I wasn't disappointed with anything hope they make a number two of this it was very good for a Disney film I don't really watch a lot of Disney films but this didn't go unnoticed with the very good acting in it jungle Cruise is definitely one of the best films of 2021 Handsdown very good.

title: A really fun "ride".
text: If you think that you are going to get two hours of crashy, bangy comedic buddy movie, hanging off a paper thin plot but with a great heart and quality supporting cast, then this is the one for you. An old school family film which isn't an animation. Remember those.

title: Incroyable!!
text: At the beginning I was not sure but then I realized I was having the best time of my life!

title: It's not another worst movie, but it's awfully close (and there's no annoying overuse scene)
text: This could be the dumbest movie I've ever seen. It's like they were making it up as they went along. You could say "but it's a children's movie", but there are plenty of scenes that could be considered too disturbing for children. It's well cast though, even though everyone's just hamming it up.

title: The African Queen (1952) remake.
text: The Mummy, Indiana Jones and of course The African Queen all came to mind while watching this movie. As a huge fan of The rock I don't think he was the best person casted for the lead. He just looks out of place, has absolutely no chemistry with Emily Blunt, and felt forced. I just don't see what the rock brought to the role besides muscles which his character didn't even need. I would've preferred Oscar Isaac in this role but that's just me. Emily Blunt was the best part of the movie her charisma and presence was easy to enjoy. Jake Whitehall and Jesse Plemons did a great job at adding comedy. Overall it was ok, predictable since it's just borrowing from other films.

title: Great adventure film
text: I really enjoyed this film! Great adventure, funny, exciting, feel good film. Rock and Blunt gave great on screen chemistry too. Don't listen to the bad reviews its brilliant!

title: The first half of this film is one of the worst movies I've ever seen.
text: Anytime this film tried to ground itself in "reality", it completely fell apart. I didn't begin to enjoy this film until the sincere scene between Jack and The Rock cutting wood. Everything to that point was garbage and absolute fluff. I lived in Paraguay for 2 years and almost everything about the animals and the indigenous people is so rascist and completely steriotipical of a white perspective. I understand that this film is from a perspective of WW1 but it was ludicrously inaccurate and boardering on rascist. I doubt that any of the writers have even visited the native people of South America. Koa ha'e ñaña. Y tav'y, che ra'a.

title: Emily Blunt and Emily Blunt!!
text: I honestly use to love the ROCK but his stuff is just "blah" but Emily Blunt can do no wrong in my opinion. Jungle Cruise is fun and perfect for family but they really shouldn't make another one with ROCK. Emily with a comedian like Ryan Reynolds would be perfect. Comedy, Drama, Action, Dark or Fun, this lady is the best actress in Hollywood. It's really a shame that's she has not received an Oscar Nomination for several of her movies in the past. The problem with any of those reward shows is that they look at a single performance so someone out of nowhere could win and not do anything else after or before. Should be some sort of criteria for even qualifying similar to sports. Have you seen a Rookie win MVP in sports? It's rare, if not at all so why would you give a no-name an important award such as Oscar.

title: 8.5/10, NICE MOVIE FOR ALL
text: WORTH WATCHING FOR PLEASURE AND ENTERTAINMENT - A GOOD MOVIE. ALL CHARACTERS JUSTIFIED THEIR ROLES. GOOD CAMERA AND CHOREOGRAPHY. GOOD TAKING . MUCH BETTER IF WATCHED ON BIG SCREENS.

title: Above average
text: People found some parts funny and enjoyed it. But it was too disney for me. I think the casting was good but the movie was really for kiddy kids. Not sayin I expected violence or something but it just wasn't that funny or entertaining. But I was never bored. Nothing worse than a movie that is boring , like Snake Eyes, and I'm waiting for it to end.

title: This one really surprised me
text: I went into this movie with almost zero expectations. Boy was I wrong. This movie is the spiritual successor to Raiders of the lost Ark. Great plot twists and visuals all throughout the movie. The Rock did an Excellent job. He has really evolved in his acting skills. Should definitely be looked at as an evolved actor not just a wrestler now. Good family fun I would recommend to anyone.

title: What a truly awful film
text: I hate giving negative reviews for films but in this case I ll make an exception. My invalid wife was desperate to see this movie so I joined a streaming service to get it for her. Disappointed is too good a word for it. Factor in that the actors were paid millions to do it, fussed over on set and probably got a nice free holiday after the final shoot. They must see the film right? They must know how bad the film is? No probably took the money and ran. The only way to sell the film to the general public, one as bad as this anyway, is to hype it to the hilt. Brainwash me, my poor wife and all the rest who wanted to see a good action comedy to cheer up their lives a bit. To Emily Blunt and Wayne Johnston I say yes, you've starred in good movies in the past but sitting with your partners together at night, at home, you must shake your head whilst viewing this. This isn't acting, its stealing money from people who are desperate for a bit of cheer. I'm sorry to be so negative, I'm just annoyed.

title: Great Family Movie
text: Great adventures movie. Some good dad jokes. We loved it! I gotta say it was nice to watch. It was entertaining, has action and comedy good story line.

title: Spectacular Film
text: It was a really amazing film. I enjoy this whole movie. Every Action, Adventures is brilliant.

title: Enjoyable!
text: Emily Blunt and Dwayne Johnson have surprising chemistry on screen. They seem like an odd couple at first, but you can tell they genuinely like each other. The whole movie was exciting and had tons of conflict, keeping me interested the whole time. Overall, the movie was great, it left me feeling good in the end and thinking about it the next day.

title: Good old fashioned adventure film
text: Took four kids of varying ages to see this film and everyone loved it. Great family adventure film with a good cast and lots of film. Dwayne Johnson and Emily a blunt had good chemistry with great support from. Jack Whitehall who brought the laughs.

title: Good Movie!
text: The writing was clever, acting good and storyline was fun and entertaining. Feel good funny movie!

title: Sooo much fun
text: We went with children, soo much fun! It was like a roller coaster, a job well done! Although some scenes may be a little too much for younger audiences.

title: Great fun for all the family
text: This is a great film for two hours of escapism of good humour fused with CGI with very well paired actors. It's takes a pinch of Jumanji, Indiana Jones, Tomb Raider and Pirates of the Caribbean and creates a perfect blend of action, comedy and suspense from start to finish. Ignore the doubters and just dive in for an easy to watch enjoyful movie that brings a your face.

title: Really enjoyed
text: Really enjoyed the movie in quite some time. Well done team.

title: Theater
text: I like to rate new movies by how I would have preferred to watch it. If it's the price of a theater, the price of a rental or wait to watch it on TV. With that being said, the kids and I really enjoyed this movie. I think it is worth going to the theater or in our case, getting it on Disney +.

title: Enjoyable
text: I really enjoyed this movie. Great chemistry among the cast members. Good adventurous movie, and non-stop action. Wonderful story. Keeps you guessing to what may happen. Worth viewing!

title: GREAT MOVIE
text:
VERY INTERESTING AND FUN TO WATCH
I THINK MOST PEOPLE WILL GIVE IT A 5 TO 9 RATTING
I GAVE IT A 9 FOR A LOT OF REASONS AND I'M 37.

title: Cast worked well together
text: Fun dialog, though sometimes predictable. Enjoyed the graphics as the map segued from paper to live. What they can do with animals these days!

title: Buy the ticket, take the ride....
text: First off I have a love/hate relationship with Disney...Jungle cruise was a boring ride, the poor Disney employees that got stuck manning the ride knew this and organically over the years created an experience out of complete boredom! Home to some of the most comedic Disney employees where they created a fun story line that made this ride fun. It was simple and pure. They literally made a gem out of a rock.After destroying two (to say the least) beloved franchises at the hands of Burton and Depp (wonka and wonderland) I was hesitant to ruin my childhood memories of a pointless story-less 15 minute ride at Disneyland. Luckily Disney has learned it lesson and they have nothing to do with project.So when I heard the Rock was taking on the Jungle cruise... I was not exactly thrilled! BUT, Dwayne Johnson successfully rebooted the Jumanji series when the entire world doubted him. He has made his way in the industry literally turning rocks into gems... (pun intended)I then thought to myself, Depp (whom I have much admiration for) would remind me that our favorite gonzo adventurer would always say, "So we shall let the (viewer) answer this question for himself: who is the happier man, he who has braved the storm of life and lived or he who has stayed securely on shore and merely existed?"I heard the great Doctor himself say, "Buy the ticket, take the ride."This Gonzo Gem is an action packed, thrilling adventure through the Amazon that completely reimagined the boring 15 minute ride!And "Wow, what a ride"

title: Jungle Cruise Delivers
text: Apart from a cheesy adventure story with a mythical-tinged storyline, breathtaking scenery and the obligatory contentious love story resplendent with a quirky side-kick... what else did you expect? It's no Indiana Jones, Pirates of the Caribbean, or The Mummy, but it shares a similar nuance with Romancing the Stone, Tomb Raider, King Solomon's Mines (Richard Chamberlain) and Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson's brand of Jumanji and Journey2.I'd make this a date movie or something fun to watch with mates; but if you're watching this alone and expecting something more cerebral, you're just setting yourself up for disappointment.I love this movie and would like to see more movies like this.

title: A great cast but rehashes a lot of elements from previous films. (Everyone forgot about this movie)
text: Jungle Cruise is an alright film thanks to the chemistry between Dwayne and Emily that makes it entertaining enough to watch for all ages. How ever the narrative is nothing special, and is Disney basically recycling some of their story elements from the past but changing it up a bit to make it some what more interesting. The plot is similar to Tangled with its premise of a specific plant having the ability to provide healing for all kinds of diseases or wounds, except this film is a treasure hunt race between the protagonists and antagonists similar to films like Atlantis: The lost empire.Villains: This film has two sets of villains, one being played by Jesse Plemons, and the other being a group that has a back story with Dwayne character. Jesse character, is one dimensional that has an unclear reason for trying to locate this plant in order to win a war, something that is only mentioned once through out the film and is never really explored further. The other group of villains were pretty great since they had a connection to the character of Dwayne and the Jungle, but didn't have a lot of screen time unfortunately.Supporting characters: The supporting characters to our protagonists is McGregor and a tiger, that although had some funny moments, didn't really have anything to add to the story besides just being there for comedic moments and has a plot device when the story couldn't carry on its own.Stakes: The stakes were pretty high with some close call moments, and knowing how important this plant is to the characters, specifically between Dwayne and the group which is revealed later, really helps create a strong ending.

title: Haven't Seen it Yet, Have Questions
text: Does Rock kiss Emily? Why would this movie cost 200m to make? That is like one of the highest budgeted movies ever. I visited Walt Disney World as a pre teen and thought it was the most boring place. I rode that jungle cruise which was a total young kid's ride. I will never understand the fascination with the parks.
